Package aoop.asteroids.model.networking

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientNetworkIO
    IO for clients, can receive and send packets and messages
    Joiner
    Thread for new players who join multiplayer mode game
    Server
    Server Thread, contains the real game and all clients
    ServerNetworkIO
    IO class for the server, sends and receives DatagramPacket
    Spectator
    Thread for users to spectate multiplayer mode game
